attributes.action: 3 Million small business's are excluded from financial support
attributes.additional_details: remove the restrictions(rules and conditions) applied by Covid support packages that excludes the good taxpaying people of these United Kingdoms
attributes.background:
Small business cannot afford to take on more debt to survive
Small business cannot afford the beurocracy in understanding the restrictive contraints of the limited support that exists
Small business have purposfully been excluded and denied support, Furlough is not an option either

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845
